mapper.select:
select
,
, cf.FILE_PATH , cf.FILE_NAME from tb_health_care_fam_pre fp left join tb_culpro_file cf on fp.itemCode = cf.DATA_CODE
where STATUS in (2,4,5)
where STATUS in (1,2,3,5)
where STATUS in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6)
order by fp.itemUpdateAt desc
mapper.update: update tb_health_care_fam_pre set VISIT_NUM = VISIT_NUM + 1 where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}
